pages.title: Gara's Edo Village
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO Wonderful: The Shogun and the 21 Core Medals (2011, movie)$(br2)Spawn locations: Forest, Plains$(br2)Includes 4 $(l:ooo/mobs/knight_soldier)Knight Soldier$(/l) spawners$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)18 $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)Cell Medals$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:ooo/items/core_medals#cobra_medal)Cobra Medal$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:ooo/items/core_medals#kame_medal)Kame Medal$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:ooo/items/core_medals#wani_medal)Wani Medal$(/l)$(li)1 Iron Sword$(li)4 Coal$(li)6 Torches$(li)6 Gold Ingots
